title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 502.4 - Registry and forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 502.4 - Registry and forms

State Regulations

Commencing September 1, 1987, the director shall maintain and
update annually a registry of generators which have submitted reports for the
preceding calendar year. Commencing November 1, 1987 and by January 15th of
each year thereafter, the director shall forward instructions for obtaining
reporting forms to each generator listed on the most recent registry, at the
address indicated on the registry. The foregoing notwithstanding, each
generator, including new generators, shall be responsible for obtaining blank
reporting forms from the director. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
502.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
